help.title: Nicknamer module help
help.description:
`nicknamer` 
Get the info 

`nicknamer list` 
Get all nicknames 

`nicknamer prefix <Only uppest role: 'yes', 'no'> <Role> [<Prefix>]` 
Set (or remove if not set) the prefix! 

`nicknamer suffix <Only uppest role: 'yes', 'no'> <Role> [<Suffix>]` 
Set (or remove if not set) the suffix! 

`nicknamer info <Role>` 
Get the info about a role and the suffix/prefix 

`nicknamer update <User>` 
Update the nickname of a user 

`nicknamer get <User>` 
Get the nickname of a user

list.title: List of roles with special names
list.usage: Wrong usage of `list`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

info.title: %{n} #%{i}
info.usage: Wrong usage of `info`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

prefix.usage: Wrong usage of `prefix`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

invalid.upper: You must use the parameter `yes` or `no`!

success.yes: Successfully set the upper prefix of the role!
success.no: Successfully set the normal prefix of the role!

remove.yes: Successfully removed the upper prefix of the role!
remove.no: Successfully removed the normal prefix of the role!

suffix.usage: Wrong usage of `suffix`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

invalid.upper: You must use the parameter `yes` or `no`!

success.yes: Successfully set the upper suffix of the role!
success.no: Successfully set the normal suffix of the role!

remove.yes: Successfully removed the upper suffix of the role!
remove.no: Successfully removed the normal suffix of the role!

update.usage: Wrong usage of `update`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

get.usage: Wrong usage of `get`. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!

commands.usage: Wrong usage. Use `nicknamer` to see the help!
